text: Need Morgan Morris for Subway campaign. Budget around $6,519, looking for 1 x Twitter post, 3 x 60-second YouTube video, 3 x Facebook post, 1 x 2-minute tutorial, 3 x 15-second TikTok. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
